Reviews.Title: TV Fails only 8 months after warrany expires
Reviews.Author: Sengakuji
Reviews.Content: Yeah the TV worked great when it was working. 8 months after the warranty expired, it went kaput! As far as I'm concerned the Sanyo DP42849 is an inferior product of crappy quality.  Evidently this problem is happening to many owners of this useless piece of garbage.  One day you turn on your TV, the power light comes on, but no picture or sound.  What has happened is that the power management board (PN# DPS-260LP) has failed.  I tried to negotiate with customer service, yeah it's 8 months out of warranty but come on!  Is it too much to ask that my TV not die in less than 2 years?  Is 5 or 6 years too much to ask?  This problem will cost you well in excess of $200! (price of part, tax, delivery and installation) When I called Sanyo support..you're not gonna belive this "..yes sir, I understand your frustration." .. See Beavis & Butthead "Tech Support"  What I finally got from Sanyo Support essentially sums up to "Your warranty's expired, you ain't gettin' diddly from us! Just piss off and go away!"  Ordering the replacement part from Sanyo parts department is just as unpleasant.  I said that $170 + 10 shipping was a rip off!  "Well sir, you're welcome to buy your part from someone else!", that's the response I got! That condescending old hag knows full well that I can't find that part anywhere else?  I know because I wasted hours and hours on the internet trying to find one. Seems that everybody's out of stock. I'll never buy any of Sanyo's crap ever again!Update: if the power management unit fails, it's quite likely that it fried your screen/panel.  At that point you're better just putting it out on the curb and buying a new TV.  I got a VISIO! Over a year and a half..still chuggin' away.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo DP42849 TV
Reviews.Author: beckiraye
Reviews.Content: This tv seemed nice for a while. It lasted 1 and 1/2 years. It just went out one day. The green light comes on and that is it. The tv repairman said it will cost me $100 just to look at it.And if it is the power supply that is another $100. But it could be other things. After reading many reviews on this tv it seems to be a piece of crap. Thanks Sanyo. Never will I buy anything with your name on it. I will also look for companies  you are affiliated with and not buy their products either. A tv set should last more than a year and half. If I could give this tv and company minus stars I would..'

Reviews.Title: Sanyo is SCAMMING Customers BIG TIME!
Reviews.Author: Surfer Girl 27
Reviews.Content: Bought a Sanyo 47 inch LCD TV from Walmart less than 1 year ago & it kept turning off randomly for no reason.  We just dealt with it for awhile, but tonight my husband & I read TONS of reviews about other Sanyo TV's doing the same thing, & worse - turning off & staying off & not working at all!  I saw this & read it to my husband who said, "At least we don't have that problem."  Minutes later, we did.  Our TV just turned off & won't go on anymore.  NEVER buying anything Sanyo again, and I cannot believe they do not care anything at all for their brand name.  Don't believe me?  Just Google Sanyo TV problems, you'll see thousands of complaints, with NO response or help from Sanyo.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Jase
Reviews.Content: I have owned my Sanyo for 3 years and its been a great TV. It has a good picture and has had a lot of use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Datmina
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 4 years ago and it has been a great TV. The picture quality was great 4 years ago, nothing compared to today's TVs but this was a great purchase. I purchased it from Walmart for a fair price and its still going strong, no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Still running strong
Reviews.Author: BunBun
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a little over 4 years.  I mainly use it as my computer monitor and to play PS3 games on.  It's still working awesomely.Cons:The color isn't the best =/It's also quite heavy

Reviews.Title: Sanyo 42" tv dp42849
Reviews.Author: Disspec98
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv 2 years ago for $350.00. Apparently this is a known issue that it craps out! No pic or sound. Total waste of money! Will never buy again!

Reviews.Title: No problems for me
Reviews.Author: wade harrell
Reviews.Content: I've owned this TV since May 2010 and have had no problems. I like the TV so far so I was surprised to see the negative reviews.
